div.p: Translation: from P.Oxy. 12 ... Sarapammon son of Psois son of Inuris ..., Arius whose other name is Amois, son of Amois son of Apollonius,for cloth-weavers’ tax. Total 3 persons not traced(?). And from personal dues upon certain individuals who have gone away to unknown places: at Nebo, Sarapammon son of Psois son of Inuris, for poll-tax 16 drachmae, for ... 3 ob.. for prison-guards’ tax (?) ..., for the six-drachmae tax on asses 5 dr. 1 ob., for ... 4 dr., ... for embankments-tax 7 dr. 1/2 ob., for the rate for dipla..., for Heracleopolite pairs (of loaves ?) 10 dr. ...,for Heliopolite . dr. 4(?) ob.
